title: 200 opposition activists detained at democratic forum in Moscow. Russian authorities says they were breaking Covid-19 protocol
content:
1. 200 opposition activists detained at democratic forum in Moscow. Russian authorities says they were breaking Covid-19 protocol  CNN
  2. Russian police detain around 200 people, including leading opposition figures, at Moscow meeting  Yahoo News
  3. Police detain participants in Russian opposition forum  The Associated Press
  4. Russian police detain hundreds at forum held by opposition organization deemed 'undesirable'  USA TODAY
  5. Russian police detain more than 170 at opposition forum in Moscow  Los Angeles Times
  6. View Full Coverage on Google News
contentSnippet:
200 opposition activists detained at democratic forum in Moscow. Russian authorities says they were breaking Covid-19 protocol  CNN

localize.title: 200名反对派活动家在莫斯科的民主论坛上被拘留。俄罗斯当局说他们违反了Covid-19议定书
200名反對派活動家在莫斯科的民主論壇上被拘留。俄羅斯當局說他們違反了Covid-19議定書
